summary: Oversee sampling strategy, artisan scheduling, and hand-finishing quality review across couture capsules. Lead a team of 18 artisans across two ateliers in Paris and Mumbai.
Developed seasonal motif systems and stitch maps for couture gowns, jackets, and veil commissions. Created technique documentation used as the studio reference standard.
Delivered concept-to-sample embroidery stories with a focus on botanical motifs and hand-applied metalwork. Contributed to three Paris Couture Week presentations.
Trained in Luneville hook technique, goldwork fundamentals, and atelier production workflows. Assisted senior artisans on haute couture and bridal commissions.
